title: Application complete
successParagraph1: Your application will be processed as soon as the Probate Registry receives your documents.
successParagraph2: You will receive the grant of probate and any copies you’ve ordered within 20 working days of your documents being received.
successParagraph3: We’ll email you if we need any more information. You can also call the Probate Registry on {helpLineNumber} if you have any questions.
successParagraph4: Find out what to do when you receive your grant of probate.
survey: This is a new service â€“ your feedback will help us to improve it.
